{{Infobox football tournament season | title = Copa del Rey | year = 1915 | other_title = | image = | imagesize = | caption = | country = Spain | num_teams = 4 | defending champions = | champions = [[Athletic Bilbao]] | runner-up = [[RCD Espanyol|RCD EspaÃ±ol]] | matches = 4 | goals = 16 | top goal scorer = | player = | prevseason = [[1914 Copa del Rey|1914]] | nextseason = [[1916 Copa del Rey|1916]] }} The '''Copa del Rey 1915''' was the 13rd edition of the [[Copa del Rey]], the [[Spain|Spanish]] [[Association football|football]] cup. The competition started on April 15, 1915 and concluded on May 2, 1915 with the Final, held at the [[Estadio de Amute]] in [[Irun]], in which [[Athletic Bilbao]] lifted the trophy for the 6th time ever with a 2â1 victory over [[RCD Espanyol|RCD EspaÃ±ol]]. ==Teams== * '''North Region''': [[Athletic Bilbao]] * '''Center Region''': [[Sociedad GimnÃ¡stica EspaÃ±ola|Sociedad GimnÃ¡stica]]The champions of the Center Region were Racing de Madrid, which could not participate in the cup tournament due to not having inscribed six months in advance at the [[RFEF|Spanish Football Federation]]. *'''[[Galicia (Spain)|Galicia]]''': [[Real Club Fortuna de Vigo|Fortuna de Vigo]] * '''[[Catalonia]]''': [[RCD Espanyol|RCD EspaÃ±ol]] ==Semifinals== ===First leg=== {{footballbox | date = April 18, 1915 | team1 = [[Real Club Fortuna de Vigo|Fortuna de Vigo]] | score = 0–0 | team2 = [[Athletic Bilbao]] | stadium = [[Vigo]] }} ===Second leg leg=== {{footballbox | date = April 25, 1915 | team2 = [[Real Club Fortuna de Vigo|Fortuna de Vigo]] | score = 5–1 | team1 = [[Athletic Bilbao]] | stadium = [[Bilbao]] }} ''Athletic won 5–1 on aggregate'' {{footballbox | date = April 15, 1915 | team1 = [[Sociedad GimnÃ¡stica EspaÃ±ola|Sociedad GimnÃ¡stica]] | score = 2–3 | team2 = [[RCD Espanyol|RCD EspaÃ±ol]] | stadium = }} ''RCD EspaÃ±ol qualified to the final. This was a single game eliminatory. ==Final== {{main|1915 Copa del Rey Final}} {{footballbox| date= 2 May 1915| time=16:30| team1= [[Athletic Bilbao]] | score= 5–0 | report= | team2= [[RCD Espanyol|RCD EspaÃ±ol]] | goals1= [[Rafael Moreno Aranzadi|Pichichi]] {{goal|4|pen.|43}}
